title: Lazy town è una cosa bella .

embed.description: Sing along if you're a pirate! Music video from the LazyTown Pirate episode: Rottenbeard Subscribe to the LazyTown YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=lazytown Visit the LazyTown website: http://www.lazytown.com Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lazytown LazyTown is all about promoting a healthy lifestyle for children, in a positive, entertaining and catchy way and is recognized world-wide through channels such as the successful television series, live events and branded consumer products.
